bibl.note: Meaning and institutional context of the term §p‹ tå j°nia, especially in Zenon's archive. - P. 253 : provisional reading of an unpublished text, dealing with the supply of a quota of pigs destined to be sent to the king. <epi ta xenia>
ALY Zaki, ÉEp‹ tå j°nia in Ptolemaic Egypt (iii/BC). <epi ta xenia>
